QuestData.Title: Born to Shred
QuestData.Description:
The Iron Shredder is operational! It should be primed and ready for you to shred our enemies in Tuurem!
Head inside and see what damage you can do. Can't say I'm not jealous.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $2oa Iron Horde in Tuurem using the Iron Shredder.

Objectives.Objective: Take control of the Iron Shredder
